outputs.output_descr:
The overall objective of this project is to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the STAE and CNE to conduct efficient and productive electoral civic education.
The Electoral Cycle Approach views electoral assistance as an ongoing and cyclical activity than an event-driven at determined points in time. The following project-specific outputs will be achieved: a) The technical capacity of STAE staff in civic education strengthened based on best practices.b) electoral civic education and voter registration programmes institutionalized; c)  Civic education actions directed to secondary schools; d) Media and political parties trained on electoral administration; e) Partnerships developed with CSOs, government officials, FBOs in civic education. Women participation in electoral processes promoted; f) Administrative and operational support provided for electoral civic education

project_descr: Support to the Electoral Process through Improved Electoral Civil Responsibility at Decentralized Level
